chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:

Hello,
Unfortunately, the phone came with damage to the casing (see photos). As I am dependent on this phone, a repair or cancellation is not an option. However, I expect to find this in excellent condition as well. 
I request a prompt inspection and discount, since the phone does not meet the offered conditions and thus the purchase price.

Thank you very much and best regards
Jessica Rathay

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

The customer had the following issue with their item: He ordered mint but got very good. 

They would like a partial refund.

This message is just an FYI. I will take care of the partial refund. 

Best regards,
Esra-Nur Back Market Customer Care
